lokaya pura shitha ruthuwa wiwidha wu wenas deshiya nam walin hadunwanu labayi.udaharanayak lesa meksikowe shitha ruthuwa kunatu ruthuwa lesa hadunwayi.lokaye anekuth gharma kalapiya sthana,shitha ruthuwa pawathina warshaye kalaya owun wasaya karana pradeshawalata anuwa deshiya namin hadunwayi.me pilibadawa itha tharkanukula wishishta udaharanaya wanuye uthuru oostreliyawe aadiwasi gothra wisin ruthu sandaha dena lada wiwidha keti nam layisthuwe hamuweyi.desambar sita marthu dakwa shitha kalaya sandaha dena lada sankethamaya namaya, dena lada wiwidha wu aadiwasi grothra wasaya karana kottashaya wanuye gudjew ya.mema wachanaye arthaya pulul lesa bharagaththada eya tharka kirima sadharana wanuye mema kalaye pawathina thadabala akunu gasim, ganwathura saha wipula aswanna nisaya.
mema pradeshawala athi wagawan athara the saha udarata elawaluwalata pramukhasthanayak himi we.
me wasaredi militari sanwedi mehewarata bara wu balawegayak sandaha.
